method.text: Cut the prepared pineapple flesh into small pieces and reserve any juice. Place juice, sugar and vinegar in a large saucepan or preserving pan and bring to the boil.
Add sultanas, cinnamon and ginger to pan and simmer for 5 min, stirring occasionally. Add pumpkin seeds and pineapple and simmer gently for 10 min, stirring frequently, until the chutney is thick.
Pour the chutney into hot, dry sterilised jars. Cover with a lid, seal and label. Store in a cool dark place until required.
